mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cowork_info (cw_title, cw_intro, cw_content, cw_img, cw_limit, hash_tag , user_id) VALUES (#{cw_title}, #{cw_intro}, #{cw_content}, #{cw_img}, #{cw_limit}, #{hash_tag}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cw_title, c.cw_intro, c.cw_content, c.cw_img, c.cw_limit, c.user_id, c.hash_tag FROM cowork_info c LEFT JOIN user_info u ON c.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY c.cw_idx DESC
